content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Juan. I understand that you are looking for a place to live in Mannheim, and I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you.

What rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible.

I am a student, I want to be responsible and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Therefore, I am willing to negotiate with you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I see, Juan. I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me.

In that case, I would like to propose a rental price of €500 per month. This is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a central location in Mannheim. I believe it is a reasonable price for a student who wants to be responsible and live on a budget.

What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €500 per month.

I am grateful for your offer, and I want to thank you for your time.

I am a student, and I will be responsible and on good terms with you as my landlord.

I am sure this will be a good experience for me in Mannheim.

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €500 per month, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me and your commitment to being responsible and on good terms with me as your landlord.

I am also glad to hear that you are excited about your experience living in Mannheim. I hope you have a great time here and that you find your new home comfortable and convenient.

If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I am always here to help.

Thank you for choosing to rent from me, Juan. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
